typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> demostorage2019Logo
demostorage2019Logo derive(load_date = currentDate()) ~> AddLoadDate
AddLoadDate sink(input(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		parent_id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
